name: Blueberries
discription: Fresh and juicy blueberries, perfect for snacking or adding to your favorite recipes. Packed with antioxidants and vitamins.

name: Fresh Coconuts
discription: Fresh and healthy coconuts directly from the farm to your doorstep. Rich in nutrients and perfect for hydration.

name: Pineapple
discription: Sweet and tangy pineapples, bursting with tropical flavor. Great for smoothies, desserts, or enjoying on their own.

name: Strawberries
discription: Fresh and ripe strawberries, perfect for snacking or adding to your favorite recipes. Packed with vitamins and antioxidants.
